name: Warrior
description: A powerful warrior who specializes in direct attacks.

name: Guardian
description: A stalwart defender with strong armor.

name: Healer
description: A supportive character who can heal allies.

name: Mage
description: A powerful spellcaster with regenerating shields.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior with both armor and shields.

name: Ranger
description: A nimble archer with high speed.

name: Orc
description: A brutish enemy with natural armor.

name: Shaman
description: A magical enemy with protective shields.
